description:
Kouichi and his classmates set off in Reiko`s car to meet her former classmate Matsunaga, the man who holds a clue to stopping the calamity, at the resort hotel where he works. As they spend the day at the beach awaiting his arrival, they run into Mei, who`s staying nearby at her family`s summer home. They all enjoy their freedom from the anxiety of being stuck in Yomiyama until...
Source: crunchyroll
